Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Texas in 1989...
Released by Texas on 3/2/1989...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 3/2/1989 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/24/1992 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Traded from New York (N) to Los Angeles on 1/31/1993 (Going to LA: CF B. Giles, RF S. Green, C G. Williams. Going to NYM: LF G. Sheffield, 2B R. Gant, RF T. Benzinger, P J. Jones)...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1993, off Charles Nagy (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/1993, off David Wells (HOU)...
